font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 adj. 根深的；积习的： firmly established by long persistence
【例】 the inveterate tendency to overlook the obvious 总是忽视显而易见事物的习惯
【近】 chronic, entrenched, ingrained, rooted, settled, hard-cored
【反】 adventitious 偶然的
【记】 from in- "in, into" + veterare "to make old,"
